metadata.title: CVE-2022-2122 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: DOS / potential heap overwrite in qtdemux using zlib decompression. Integer overflow in qtdemux element in qtdemux_inflate function which causes a segfault, or could cause a heap overwrite, depending on libc and OS. Depending on the libc used, and the underlying OS capabilities, it could be just a segfault or a heap overwrite.

notes.note: rodrigo-zaiden> openjfx includes qtdemux.c from gstreamer and might be affected.

criterions.comment: gst-plugins-good1.0 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
openjfx package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
